definition: to stick up/to rise on one end/to tilt
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
see-saw/also written 蹺蹺板|跷跷板[qiao1 qiao1 ban3]

sentences.english: There is a red seesaw in the park.
sentences.chinese: 公園裏有個紅色的翹翹板。

sentences.english: Is there a seesaw in your room?
sentences.chinese: 你的房間裏有架翹翹板嗎？

sentences.english: You can also have low, padded and carpeted seesaws.
sentences.chinese: 你還可以用零角碎料，製作低矮的翹翹板。
